author: Ewan Palmer
title: Virginia Pastor Dies From Coronavirus After Previously Saying 'Media Is Pumping Out Fear' About Pandemic
description: Landon Spradlin previously shared Facebook meme suggesting the media is reporting on the virus just to attack Trump.
content:
A Virginia man who downplayed the seriousness of the coronavirus as merely the media "pumping out fear" has died after contracting the virus.
Landon Spradlin, 66, a pastor and traveling musician, died on Wednesday, March 25, at a hospital in North Carolina a… [+4236 chars]
